type TableLayoutCellPaintEventHandler = delegate of obj * TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示用来处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识用于处理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 委托自定义控件的外观 。The following example shows how to a delegate to customize the appearance of a control. 此代码示例是为控件提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#100)]
